bike.description: Hi-Ten frame, STD BB shell, tig welded, formed DT/TT, externally relieved HT w/ stamped "S" logo, wrap gusset BB yoke, seat-stay mounted U-brake bosses, integrated seat collar, 6mm dropouts for 14mm axle

components.description: Specialized 1.6mm Hi-Ten 1-1/4" blades, 1-1/8" threadless, 2mm thick Hi-Ten steerer, 6mm dropouts for 14mm axle

Forged alloy 36t w/ CNC cut teeth

Fuse, 36h, sealed mech., mid flange, 14mm solid axle
